original_text: How that he was caught up into paradise, and heard unspeakable words, which it is not lawful for a man to utter.
korean_text: 그가 낙원으로 이끌려 가서 말로 표현할 수 없는 말을 들었으니 사람이 가히 이르지 못할 말이로다

sentences.original_text: How that he was caught up into paradise

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 말할 수 없는 말들을 들었다

sentences.original_text: which it is not lawful for a man to utter
sentences.korean_translation: 사람이 말하는 것이 합당치 않은 것들
